section.footer.company.title: Jaukuma
section.hero.title: Jaukuma - home page
section.hero.description: Professional floristry for events, offices and homes – a trusted partner for special occasions.
section.about.title: About us
section.about.mission: In the Lithuanian language, jaukuma means a feeling of warmth, comfort and simple joy. This emotion is the heart of our activity.
section.about.philosophy: We believe that flowers are not just products, but also personal expressions, mood creators and a source of happiness.
section.about.promise: Our mission – to offer luxury that carries jaukuma: elegant, modern flower experiences that always remain warm, personal and accessible.
section.services.title: Florist services
section.services.bouquets.title: Flower bouquets and compositions
section.services.bouquets.description: Fresh, high-quality flowers, composed into beautiful bouquets and compositions for any occasion.
section.services.decoration.title: Interior, exterior decoration
section.services.decoration.description: Professional florist decoration services for both indoor and outdoor spaces.
section.services.plants.title: Potted plants, care, rental
section.services.plants.description: Indoor and outdoor plant selection with expert care advice and maintenance services.
section.services.events.title: Event and celebration decoration
section.services.events.description: Complete florist design for weddings, corporate events and special celebrations.
section.services.subscription.title: Flower subscription
section.services.subscription.descriptio: Regular flower delivery service for homes and businesses, bringing fresh flowers according to your schedule.
section.why.title: Why Jaukuma?
section.why.description: Not just flowers – we create emotions, atmosphere and trust.
section.why.stats.experience.label: years of experience
section.why.stats.clients.label: regular business clients
section.why.stats.recommendation.label: clients recommend us to others
section.contact.title: Contact us
section.contact.description: Have an idea or upcoming event? Write to us - we'll suggest several options and budgets within 1-2 business days.
section.contact-hero.title: Contact us
section.contact-hero.description: It is a long established fact that a reader will be distracted by the readable content of a page when looking at its layout.
section.aboutus-hero.title: About us
section.aboutus-hero.description: Our mission is to create handcrafted flower compositions that not only decorate important events but also fill them with pleasant emotions.
